  • Method Details

    • checkStatus

      public String checkStatus(int currentDay)
      Returns a string describing the state of the crop, i.e. "growing", "harvestable", or "withered".
      Parameters:
      currentDay - the current day in the farm.
      Returns:
      the status of this crop.

    • loadImages

      public void loadImages()
      Loads the images for a crop to be displayed in the game panel.

    • setWithered

      public void setWithered(Tile tile, String status)
      If the crop has withered, this sets the tile that it's on to withered as well.
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile that the crop is on
      status - the status of the crop

    • randomizeYield

      public int randomizeYield()
      Generates a random int based on the minimum and maximum yield of the crop to determine it's yield upon harvest.
      Returns:
      the randomly generated yield of this crop.

    • computeHarvestTotal

      public double computeHarvestTotal(Farmer farmer)
      Computes the initial price of the harvest based on the yield, crop's base price, and farmer type's earning bonus.
      Parameters:
      farmer - the character which the player is playing as.
      Returns:
      this crop's intial harvest total.

    • computeWaterBonus

      public double computeWaterBonus(Farmer farmer)
      Computes the bonus the player has earned for watering the crop extra times, if any.
      Parameters:
      farmer - the character which the player is playing as.
      Returns:
      this crop's water bonus.

    • computeFertBonus

      public double computeFertBonus(Farmer farmer)
      Computes the bonus the player has earned for fertilizing the crop extra times, if any.
      Parameters:
      farmer - the character which the player is playing as.
      Returns:
      this crop's fertilizer bonus.

    • computeFinalPrice

      public double computeFinalPrice(Farmer farmer)
      Computes the final price of the harvested crop by adding all applicable bonuses to the initial harvest total.
      Parameters:
      farmer - the character which the player is playing as.
      Returns:
      this crop's final harvest price

    • canPlant

      public boolean canPlant(int x, int y, MyFarm farm)
      Check is the plant can be planted on the tile coordinates specified.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the tile.
      y - the vertical coordinate of the tile.
      farm - the farm in which the crops are planted.
      Returns:
      true if the plant can be planted on the tile, false if it cannot.

    • getCropName

      public String getCropName()
      Gets this crop's name.
      Returns:
      this crop's name

    • getCropType

      public String getCropType()
      Gets this crop's type, i.e. "RootCrop", "Flower", or "Tree".
      Returns:
      this crop's type

    • getFinalPrice

      public double getFinalPrice()
      Gets the computed final price of this crop.
      Returns:
      this crop's final price

    • getWaterCount

      public int getWaterCount()
      Gets the amount of times this crop has been watered.
      Returns:
      this crop's water count

    • getFertCount

      public int getFertCount()
      Gets the amount of times this crop has been fertilized.
      Returns:
      this crop's fertilizer count

      public int getPlantDay()
      Gets the day this crop was planted.
      Returns:
      this crop's plant day

      public int getHarvestTime()
      Gets the days it takes for the plant to be ready for harvest.
      Returns:
      this crop's harvest time

      public boolean getHarvestable()
      Checks if this crop is harvestable or not.
      Returns:
      this crop's harvestable status

      public boolean getWithered()
      Checks if this crop is withered or not
      Returns:
      this crop's withered status

    • getHarvestTotal

      public int getHarvestTotal()
      Gets the crop's initial harvest price before the added water and fertilizer bonuses.
      Returns:
      this crop's inital harvest total

    • getYield

      public int getYield()
      Gets the yield this crop's harvest has produced.
      Returns:
      this crop's yield

    • getSeedCost

      public int getSeedCost()
      Gets the cost of planting this crop's seed.
      Returns:
      the cost of this crop's seed

    • getExpYield

      public double getExpYield()
      Gets the experience the player earns from harvesting this crop.
      Returns:
      the experience gained from this crop.

    • setImage

      public BufferedImage setImage(int currentDay)
      Gets the appropriate image of the crop depending on it's current growth stage.
      Parameters:
      currentDay - the day the player is currently playing.
      Returns:
      the image of the crop.

    • getStage

      public char getStage(int currentDay)
      Gets the current stage of the crop based on the day it was planted and the current day as well as it's harvest time. This affects how the plant looks in the game panel.
      Returns:
      '0' if the plant is a seed, a number if it's still growing, and 'h' if it is ready to be harvested.

    • addWater

      public boolean addWater()
      Adds water to this crop's water count and sets it to watered.
      Returns:
      false if the crop has already been watered today, otherwise true.

    • resetWater

      public void resetWater()

    • addFert

      public void addFert()
      Adds fertilizer to this crop's fertilizer water count.
